translation.en: so I panicked.
-Yeah, she's not lying. Total meltdown. -Yeah, thanks to you, Alden.
translation.it: - Sì, è vero. Crollo totale. - Sì, grazie a te.

translation.en: So I made a bet with Alden
that I could take some person and… and… and make them over.
translation.it: che sarei riuscita a fare un makeover a una persona.

translation.en: Some person. What kind of person?
translation.it: Una persona. Che tipo di persona?

translation.en: -Can we talk about this in private? -No, what kind of person, Padgett?
translation.it: - Possiamo parlarne in privato? - No, che tipo di persona?

translation.en: The biggest loser so she could turn him into prom king.
translation.it: Un perdente da trasformare in re del ballo.

translation.en: -But that was before-- -Wait. So I was a bet?
translation.it: - Ma era prima… - Ero una scommessa?

translation.en: -[Padgett] No-- -No, I was a fucking bet.
translation.it: - No… - No, ero una fottuta scommessa.

translation.en: You can all go to hell.
Let's go.
Yikes, that was hard to watch.
translation.it: Accidenti, è stato difficile da guardare.

translation.en: Hey, it's Cameron. Leave a message, or don't.
translation.it: Ciao, sono Cameron. Lasciate un messaggio, o anche no.

translation.en: Cameron, it's me again.
I know I covered this in the 800 texts you haven't returned,
translation.it: So di averlo già detto negli 800 messaggi a cui non hai risposto,

translation.en: but I'm so sorry,
and I just want to make sure you're okay.
translation.it: e voglio solo assicurarmi che stia bene.

translation.en: He's still not answering?
[Padgett] No, but can you blame him?
No, but right now, I'm a little bit more worried about you.
translation.it: No, ma ora sono un po' più preoccupata per te.

translation.en: You and your god-awful ironing.
Please let me do that. Please.
translation.it: Ti prego, fai fare a me.

translation.en: You know, I convinced myself that I did my posts
translation.it: Sai, ero convinta di pubblicare i miei post

translation.en: because I cared about my followers, but maybe I was just doing it for myself
translation.it: perché mi importava dei follower, ma forse lo facevo per me stessa,

translation.en: to get money and get popular.
translation.it: per guadagnare soldi e diventare popolare.

translation.en: Maybe I'm just a fraud.
Honey, I happen to know for a fact that you're not a fake.
translation.it: Tesoro, so per certo che non sei finta.

translation.en: You're a truly kind and caring person.
translation.it: Sei una persona gentile e premurosa.

translation.en: But I hurt someone, Mom. I mean, I really hurt him.
translation.it: Ma ho ferito qualcuno, mamma. L'ho ferito moltissimo.

translation.en: All right, yeah.
You screwed up, but it's only a mistake if you don't learn from it.
translation.it: Hai sbagliato, ma è un errore solo se non impari.

translation.en: I just don't even know what to do anymore.
translation.it: È solo che non so più cosa fare.

translation.en: If I win tomorrow night, I'll have to go in front of all these people--
translation.it: Se vinco domani sera, dovrò andare davanti a tutti…

translation.en: And be yourself.
But… what if I don't even like who that is anymore?
translation.it: Ma se non mi piacesse più chi sono?

translation.en: Listen, I know it feels like that right now.
translation.it: Senti, so che ora ti senti così.

translation.en: I do. But the Padgett Sawyer that I know,
translation.it: Lo so. Ma la Padgett Sawyer che conosco,

translation.en: the kind, sweet, generous,
sure, stubborn girl that I've known for 18 years,
translation.it: e anche testarda ragazza che conosco da 18 anni,

translation.en: well, she gets lost now and again.
translation.it: beh, lei ogni tanto si perde.

translation.en: We all do, but she always finds her way back.
translation.it: Succede a tutti, ma lei trova sempre la via del ritorno.

translation.en: I thought you were a good judge of character. [sniffs]
All right.
-How do I look? -Gorge.
You're gonna be the queen of the chaperones.
Thank you. It looks like my car is here. All right, put your dress on.
translation.it: Grazie. La mia auto è arrivata. Metti il vestito.

translation.en: I'll see you there.
Okay.
-You're really gonna go through with this? -I mean…
translation.it: - Vuoi andare fino in fondo? - Insomma…

translation.en: I know I'm not gonna get what I want,
translation.it: So che non avrò ciò che voglio,

translation.en: so at least this way, I have a chance to make things right with Cameron.
translation.it: quindi almeno così potrò sistemare le cose con Cameron.

translation.en: -Ha! Wanna bet? -Too soon.
Nisha, I know you don't trust me.
translation.it: Nisha, so che non ti fidi di me.

translation.en: I mean, he's your best friend,
translation.it: Cioè, lui è il tuo migliore amico,

translation.en: but I think I've really fallen for him, so I have to try.
translation.it: ma credo di essermi innamorata di lui, quindi devo provarci.

translation.en: You have one big problem. There's no way that dude is going to prom.
translation.it: C'è un grosso problema. Lui non andrà mai al ballo.

translation.en: Yeah.
So I guess that means there's only one person left to ask.
translation.it: Quindi mi rimane una sola persona a cui chiedere.

translation.en: Screw off, Bubble Girl.
Okay, a little harsh,
but I have to ask.
Is he okay?
I don't know. He's at work.
translation.it: Non lo so. È al lavoro.

translation.en: Why do you keep calling me? Aren't you supposed to be at prom?
translation.it: E perché mi chiami? Non dovresti essere al ballo?

translation.en: Yeah, like half an hour ago.
But I have a really important favor to ask.
translation.it: ma devo chiederti un grosso favore.

translation.en: Tell me why in the hell I should help you.
I can't, and I know you two have lost so much more than me,
translation.it: Non lo so, e so che voi due avete perso molto più di me,

translation.en: but I've lost a lot recently.
translation.it: ma anch'io ho perso molto, di recente.

translation.en: I lost my self-respect.
translation.it: Ho perso il rispetto per me stessa.

translation.en: I lost my college fund.
I lost my friends,
but the only thing I truly care about losing…
translation.it: Ma l'unica cosa che non voglio proprio perdere

translation.en: is your brother.
[Bosch] Tonight's the big night.
Turns out this year's dance presentation is now gonna be a dance competition.
translation.it: Pare che quest'anno l'esibizione di ballo sarà una gara.

translation.en: I don't know what that means, but it's the committee's decision, and I support them.
translation.it: Non so cosa significhi, ma l'ha deciso il comitato e lo sostengo.

translation.en: Hey.
What's in the bag?
Formal wear, or the closest thing I could find to it in your closet.
translation.it: Abito formale o la cosa più simile che ho trovato nel tuo armadio.

translation.en: Dude, it's a disaster in there. Why are there so many Skittles on the floor?
translation.it: Là dentro è un disastro. Perché ci sono tante Skittles in terra?

translation.en: Because I spilled some Skittles. Look, if that's for prom, I--
translation.it: Perché mi sono cadute. Senti, se è per il ballo, io…

translation.en: Look, I know what you're gonna say, okay, and… I get it.
translation.it: Senti, so cosa stai per dire, ok? E lo capisco.

translation.en: Padgett screwed up.
What she did was mean and selfish and wrong.
translation.it: È stata cattiva, egoista e ha sbagliato.

translation.en: Yes, exactly. So why are you here?
translation.it: Sì, esatto. Allora perché sei qui?

translation.en: Because, Cam…
I've… I've missed you.
Brin, I'm right here.
No, no. I mean, like…
I miss the way you used to be, you know? Before…
translation.it: Mi manca com'eri prima, sai? Prima…

translation.en: Before Mom.
[sniffs] Ever since you've been with Padgett, okay,
you've been back, and you've been smiling again, and you've been happy.
translation.it: eri tornato, sorridevi di nuovo ed eri felice.

translation.en: And I just feel like… [sniffs] …for the first time since we moved here
translation.it: E per la prima volta da quando ci siamo trasferiti qui,

translation.en: that I have my brother back.
And don't lose her, Cam.
We lost mom, and there's nothing we could have done about that,
translation.it: Abbiamo perso la mamma e non potevamo farci niente,

translation.en: but now you have a choice, so just… just don't lose her, okay?
translation.it: ma ora puoi scegliere, quindi non perderla, ok?

translation.en: There you are, thank God. We need you to start the dance.
translation.it: Eccoti, grazie a Dio. Dobbiamo fare l'esibizione.

translation.en: -Big night, huh? -What do you want, Alden?
Nothing, I just noticed you didn't bring Cameron.
translation.it: Niente, ho solo notato che non hai portato Cameron.

translation.en: -So-- -He's not coming. Okay?
You win the bet.
And when are you gonna become a permanent loser?
translation.it: E quando diventerai una perdente per sempre?

translation.en: I'll get it done as soon as I can. Happy?
I'll be happy when I get my crown.
translation.it: Lo sarò quando avrò la corona,

translation.en: And, oh, hope you like the new choreography me and Jordan came up with.
translation.it: e spero ti piaccia la nuova coreografia mia e di Jordan.

translation.en: [Bosch] Cali High Earthquakes, it's time to report to the stage for your annual dance…
translation.it: Studenti, è ora di salire sul palco per l'esibizione annuale…

translation.en: -Come on. This is it. Let's go. -[Alden] Jordan, it's time.
translation.it: - Dai, ci siamo. Andiamo. - Jordan, è ora.

translation.en: Come on, guys. If you put your TikToks down,
you'll see some people dancing in real life.
translation.it: vedrete delle persone ballare dal vivo.

translation.en: It's gonna be great.
[sighs, speaking to self] We have some weird-ass traditions at this school.
translation.it: Abbiamo strane tradizioni in questa scuola.

translation.en: Hey, excuse me. Sorry. Hi.
We hired a DJ for this thing. They said he was over here somewhere.
translation.it: Abbiamo ingaggiato un DJ. Dovrebbe essere qui.

translation.en: -Oh actually, that's… that's me. -You're the DJ?
translation.it: - Oh, in realtà sono io. - Sei tu il DJ?

translation.en: Great. Um, where's your stuff?
-My stuff? -Yeah, your equipment.
Your… your turntables,
your jog wheel, crossfader? Your… your Traktor scratch?
translation.it: la jog wheel, il crossfader? Gli effetti Traktor?

translation.en: Dude, I have no idea what any of that stuff is.
translation.it: Amico, non ho idea di cosa sia questa roba.

translation.en: Are you telling me we paid you $4,500 for your phone?
translation.it: Mi stai dicendo che ti abbiamo pagato 4500 dollari per un cellulare?

translation.en: Yeah. Kinda. [scoffs]
You know that's more than I make in a month?
translation.it: Sai che è più del mio stipendio?

translation.en: Well… I know that now.
Hey, so no sign of Cameron?
No, and if he doesn't get here soon, it's gonna be too late.
translation.it: No, e se non si sbriga, sarà troppo tardi.

translation.en: It already is. Principal Bosch's about to announce the court.
translation.it: Lo è già. Il preside sta per annunciare i vincitori.

translation.en: -You sure you still wanna do this? -Yes.
If I win, I need you to live stream on your phone, and then go on this app
translation.it: Se vinco, fai una diretta dal tuo cellulare, vai su quest'app

translation.en: on my phone and press the red button.
-I mean, how can I do both? -Just give me the phone.
[Bosch tapping mic] Hello, hi, hey. One, two, three, eyes to me.
translation.it: Salve. Ehi, un, due, tre, guardate me.

translation.en: Come on, bring it in. It's the big moment.
translation.it: Forza, iniziamo. È il grande momento.

translation.en: I know this is live streaming, but if you put your phones down,
translation.it: So che siete in diretta, ma se mettete giù i telefoni,

translation.en: it's actually happening right here in front of you.
translation.it: è tutto proprio qui davanti a voi.

translation.en: Look, I know this means a lot to some of you, so let's get through it
translation.it: So che significa molto per alcuni di voi, quindi procediamo,

translation.en: so we can be done.
All right, your 2021 Cali High Prom King is
translation.it: D'accordo, il vostro re del ballo 2021 della Cali High è…

translation.en: [Bosch] Congratulations to Jordan.
So humble, isn't he?
Just wanna slap his face. [chuckles]
I'm kidding. I would never slap a student, not until after they graduate.
translation.it: Scherzo. Non schiaffeggio uno studente prima del diploma,

translation.en: But he's not going to graduate, so it's fine.
translation.it: ma non si diplomerà, quindi è ok.

translation.en: Okay.
-Here you go, big guy. So proud. -[chuckles]
Enjoy your moment of glory.
translation.it: Goditi il tuo momento di gloria.

translation.en: [boy] Not my favorite.
It's Jordan Van Draanen, baby.
Is that it?
Yeah, bro.
Of course, it is.
No, I just want the microphone.
-Oh, okay. -Yeah. Okay, all right, yes!
translation.it: - Oh, ok. - Sì. Ok, d'accordo, sì!

translation.en: Well, that was fun.
Moving right along. Your 2021 Prom Queen,
translation.it: Andiamo avanti. La vostra reginetta del ballo 2021,

translation.en: the woman voted to a forcible dance with the guy behind me.
translation.it: che dovrà ballare per forza con questo tizio.

translation.en: No, no, no, no, no. Keep it on. Keep it all on.
We have all seen plenty of your nipples.
translation.it: Abbiamo già visto i tuoi capezzoli.

translation.en: All right, your 2021 Prom Queen,
in the closest vote we've had in a very long time,
translation.it: con la vittoria più risicata da molto tempo a questa parte,

translation.en: [girl] Yeah, Padgett!
Congratulations.
-Thank you! -Really beautiful.
[boy] That's right, Padge!
[Padgett] This is me.
And this is also me.
And this is me too.
-Hey. -[audience laughs]
But I'm gonna let you guys in on a little secret. It's all fake.
translation.it: Ma vi svelerò un piccolo segreto. È tutto finto.

translation.en: Because the truth is, this is the real me.
translation.it: Perché la verità è che questa è la vera me.

translation.en: [Padgett] And so is this.
Let's not forget about this one.
Yep, that is snot coming out of my nose.
translation.it: Sì, quello è moccio che mi esce dal naso.

translation.en: But here's the thing.
For the last four years,
I've been so busy selling myself on social media,
translation.it: sono stata molto impegnata a vendermi sui social,

translation.en: putting out this image of who I wanted people to think I am,
translation.it: a mostrarmi come volevo che la gente mi vedesse.

translation.en: this perfect person
with perfect makeup, perfect clothes,
translation.it: con un trucco perfetto. Abiti perfetti.

translation.en: perfect grades,
the perfect boyfriend.
And trust me.
Nothing could've been further from the truth.
translation.it: nulla è più lontano dalla verità.

translation.en: I even lied about where I live.
translation.it: Ho anche mentito su dove vivo.

translation.en: We all do it…
in our own way
like someone special once told me.
translation.it: come mi ha detto una persona speciale.

translation.en: He said high school is just a bunch of scared people
translation.it: Lui ha detto che al liceo la gente è spaventata

translation.en: pretending to be something they're not,
translation.it: e finge di essere chi non è,

translation.en: and that can be true.
Especially when we're at our worst.
But it doesn't have to be that way.
translation.it: Ma non dev'essere per forza così.

translation.en: That's the lesson he taught me.
I only wish I didn't have to lose him to learn it.
translation.it: Vorrei solo non averlo dovuto perdere per capirlo.

translation.en: Are you sure?
Second place, coming through, make some room.
Second place, I'll take it. I mean, if she doesn't want it, I'll take it.
translation.it: Secondo posto, la prendo io. Se lei non la vuole, la prendo io.

translation.en: Excuse me, Ms. Pierce, you… you actually came in fourth.
translation.it: Scusi, signorina Pierce, in realtà lei è arrivata quarta.

translation.en: No, I demand a recount.
No need. You actually lost by a lot.
translation.it: Non serve. Ha perso di parecchio.

translation.en: Please leave the stage.
-[boy 3] Burn! -Thank you. All right!
So the runner-up and your 2021 Prom Queen
translation.it: la seconda classificata e la vostra reginetta 2021

translation.en: is a write-in candidate.
Her name is Celeste Straczynski.
Is there a Celeste Straczynski here?
[softly] Your hat.
-[clears throat] -All right, let's do this.
-Ow! -Suck it!
DJ, hit it!
-[Quinn] Padgett. -All right.
I'm gonna take off.
Wait, your phone.
-Where are you going? -[Padgett] Home.
Come on, stay with us.
-I officially forgive you. -[Padgett chuckles]
No, I'm done here,
but you guys have fun, though.
Well, I'm still here, and why do I know this song?
translation.it: Beh, io sono ancora qui e perché conosco questa canzone?

translation.en: -[text pings] -♪ Beside the green, green grass ♪
translation.it: MI È PIACIUTO MOLTO IL TUO DISCORSO…

translation.en: ♪ Swing, swing ♪
♪ Swing the spinning step ♪
translation.it: SCHERZI? IL MIO TELEFONO È UNA MERDA, RICORDI?

translation.en: Whoa.
Hey.
Cameron. I… How…
I may have had a little help.
translation.it: Forse ho avuto un piccolo aiuto.

translation.en: I would've rode him all the way, but I would've gotten arrested on the 405.
translation.it: Lo avrei cavalcato fin qui, ma mi avrebbero arrestato.

translation.en: I meant what I said.
I'm gonna start being honest about who I am from now on,
translation.it: Sarò onesta su chi sono, d'ora in poi,

translation.en: I swear.
Okay, well, if we're being honest, there is one thing in your speech
translation.it: Ok, se dobbiamo essere onesti, su una cosa ti sei sbagliata.

translation.en: you got wrong.
translation.it: su una cosa ti sei sbagliata.

translation.en: What was it?
You never really lost me.
Seriously?
-I'm done with her. -Thank you.
Now where were we?
[Brin] Yes! Whoo-hoo! Finally!
[boy] Check it out!
[Padgett] Good morning, guys.
Guess where we are?
Portugal! [chuckles]
Hard to believe we're already six days into our trip.
translation.it: È già il nostro sesto giorno di viaggio.

translation.en: Say hi, Cameron.
I just wanna say thank you to all my followers who came back to me,
translation.it: Ringrazio tutti i follower che sono tornati

translation.en: who are so supportive of my new direction here.
I hope you guys keep following us this summer because Cameron has promised
translation.it: Continuate a seguirci quest'estate, perché Cameron ha promesso

translation.en: to help me post photos every day along the way.
translation.it: di aiutarmi a postare foto ogni giorno.

translation.en: So stay safe, be yourself,
and I'll see you guys soon.
♪ Lift your open hand ♪
♪ Strike up the band And make the fireflies dance ♪
-All right, Alden. -[buzzing]
Never say I'm someone who welches on a bet.
translation.it: Non dire che non pago le scommesse.

translation.en: ♪ So kiss me ♪
[Padgett laughs] Sorry.
-…sister again. -Hm.
Goddamnit, I flinched.
Get it!
Working. It's working great.
Well, I'm still here, and I'm gonna say that again.
translation.it: Beh, io sono ancora qui e devo ripeterla.

translation.en: I mean, aren't you captain of the--
